description: This file defines the interface for a task executor component in C, including creation, destruction, task queue management, and task submission functions for a concurrent task execution system.

methods.name: createTaskExecutor
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new task executor instance.

methods.name: destroyTaskExecutor
methods.description: Clears and frees resources associated with the given task executor.

methods.name: drainAndDestroyTaskExecutor
methods.description: Waits for all queued tasks to finish, then destroys the task executor.

methods.name: clearTaskExecutor
methods.description: Removes all tasks from the executor's queue without necessarily waiting for their completion.

methods.name: appendTaskToExecutor
methods.description: Adds a new task to the executor's queue with specified task data, execution, and cleanup functions.

methods.name: getTaskExecutorQueueCount
methods.description: Returns the current number of tasks pending in the executor's queue.
